system.description:
You have become particularly adept at conveying the lessons of the chronicles you carry to others in practical ways and gain the following benefits:

  • You gain a +1 bonus to your choice of your Intelligence or Charisma score, to a maximum value of 20.
  • You gain the following additional battle hymn:
    • Oral Instruction. If you or one of your allies within 30ft. fail a charisma ability check or saving throw, they may use their reaction to add your intelligence modifier to the result.  If they fail an intelligence ability check or saving throw, they may use their reaction to add your charisma modifier.  You may sustain this battle hymn for a number of rounds equal to your intelligence + charisma modifier without spending further bardic inspiration.  A creature using the benefit of this battle hymn does not cause it to end.  This battle hymn ends early if you are incapacitated, silenced, or otherwise unable to speak.
